text:
The working draft of Canonical XML Version 1.1 is in last call [1]. We should
implement support for C14N 1.1 so that it can be tested as the specification
proceeds to recommendation through the W3C process.

[1] http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/WD-xml-c14n11-20061220/
